mcpServers._comment: Define MCP (Model Context Protocol) servers available to AI agents
mcpServers._usage: Add your project-specific MCP servers here. Enable/disable per session in .claude/settings.local.json
_instructions: 1. Replace example entries with your actual MCP servers
2. Remove entries starting with '_' (these are comments/examples)
3. Add only servers relevant to your project
4. Consider token cost per server (shown in descriptions)
_token_optimization_strategy: UI work: Enable UI-related MCPs only (e.g., shadcn)
Database work: Enable database MCPs only
UX audits: Enable UI + browser automation (e.g., shadcn + playwright)
Don't enable all servers simultaneously - wastes tokens
